name: sprintxgitrepos
description: We will create a script that takes gitrepos.txt, the current sprint number, and the date of last sprint cut as inputs. For each repository in gitrepos.txt, this script will: Query GitHub to determine if there have been any commits to that repository since the last sprint cut date. If so, the repository entry will be copied into a new file named "sprint-x-gitrepos.txt".
